description: Kirifos 20EC is a non-systemic organophosphate insecticide with contact, stomach, and respiratory action. It is used for broad-spectrum control of various pests.
application_rates: 20-30 ml / 10 Lit water i.e. 400-600 ml/acre (Rice); 150 ml / 10 Lit water i.e. 3 Lit/acre (Potato); 200 ml / 10 Lit water i.e. 4 Lit/acre (Tea)
side_effect: Harmful if absorbed through the skin or swallowed. Wear protective clothing. Toxic to fish, birds, and bees. Do not contaminate water sources. Cholinesterase inhibitor - avoid overexposure and prolonged contact.
crops_pests: BPH of Rice,; Cut worm of Potato,; Termites of Tea
symptoms: Hopperburn or yellowing, browning and drying of plant
causes: Brown plant hopper, Cut worm, Termites
